      • onSavePart

        public void onSavePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                throws java.io.IOException
        adds data from add part screen to main screen Part table.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - save part button pushed- sends data to main screen.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if null.
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if wrong data type is entered.
